info.task: navigate forwards to pressed toggle button
info.title: Navigate forwards to a pressed toggle button in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeButtonAndSetStateToPressed
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the button, and sets the state of the button to 'pressed'

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Mute' button.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Navigate forwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Mute' button.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
